WAGGNER’S TV SPEECH We've all heard people talk about “animal magnetism”, abo man” and the “noble savage”. As if we had lost something long evolution into civilized human beings -- and there’s this. Man is a combination of the learned and the instinc sophisticated and the primitive. We should never try to d animal, within us -- only to channel these energies in a direction. All of us have a great untapped potential -- a potential we do with that potential, with that life, depends as muc toward our physical desires as it does on the social prog minds. The struggle between mind and body is not a necess produces anger, frustration, the strain of modern-day liv that’s moving too quickly toward its own annihilation. St we fight against our impulses, when we attempt to destroy or woman within us. Repression is the father of neurosis, Let me say a few words about my new book, THE GIFT. When of us is given a gift -- the gift of life.....
